Audio.Locality: Poço Preto trail, Iguaçu NP, Parana state
Audio.Author: Daniel Lane
Audio.Comments: Response to playback from the second pair in forest edge by flooded area. The male bird had pale irides, the female had brownish irides and a green back. Approaching very closely dropping from 18m to 3m up. Photo: link:http://www.flickr.com/photos/8013969@N03/5486656790/
